name: Love You Forever
description: A perfectly chubby little heart! I knit my first hearts with Christmas ornaments in mind, but other than the fact that they are currently hanging from my Christmas tree there is nothing especially Christmassy about them. These lovely little stuffed hearts would be just as at home on Valentines day, or simply stack an assortment in a bowl and call it a center piece!
sizes_available: Stuffed heart measures approx. 2.75” at it’s widest point and 2.5” tall.
suggested_yarn: Tanis Fiber Arts Blue Label Fingering Weight
full_text: A perfectly chubby little heart! I knit my first hearts with Christmas ornaments in mind, but other than the fact that they are currently hanging from my Christmas tree there is nothing especially Christmassy about them. These lovely little stuffed hearts would be just as at home on Valentines day, or simply stack an assortment in a bowl and call it a center piece!
